title: v1.6.3.4-v9 Doc Update Complete
details:
Updated all Copilot instructions and agent files from v1.6.3.4-v8 to v1.6.3.4-v9.

Key v9 features documented:
- Transaction Pattern: beginTransaction(), commitTransaction(), rollbackTransaction()
- Complete Event Payload: _fetchEntityFromStorage(), _validateEventPayload()
- Restore Precondition Validation: _validateRestorePreconditions()
- Manager Restore Validation: restoreQuickTab() validates minimized state
- Storage Reconciliation: Manager detects suspicious changes (count drop to 0)
- Error Notifications: _showErrorNotification()

Files updated:
- .github/copilot-instructions.md (14KB)
- All .github/agents/*.md files

New storage-utils.js exports added:
- beginTransaction(logPrefix)
- commitTransaction(logPrefix)
- rollbackTransaction(logPrefix)
- captureStateSnapshot(logPrefix)
- isTransactionActive()
- getStateSnapshot()

All files verified under 15KB limit.
